title: Christina Aguilera shares photo of herself as a little girl decked out in black sequin costume
text:
Even as a child she had a strong sense of style.

Christina Aguilera took to her Instagram on Thursday evening to share a couple of throwback photos of herself as a little girl dressed for Halloween in a black sequin costume.

'I’ve always loved to dress up and I’ve clearly never been one to shy away from a big hair moment! #TBT #BabyXtina Always been the #QueenOfHalloween,' she said in the caption of the throwback photo.

Scroll down to see video

Throwback: Christina took to her Instagram to share not one, but three photos of herself as a tribute to her favorite holiday, Halloween

The young Christina wore the black sequin top with a long black satin skirt that draped to the ground.

In the photo, she wore a matching black hat on top of a full head of poofy brown hair as she worked the camera.

A white flower was pinned to the hat, in one of the costume's only light touches.

Big hair moment: 'I’ve always loved to dress up and I’ve clearly never been one to shy away from a big hair moment! #TBT #BabyXtina Always been the #QueenOfHalloween,' she said in the caption of the throwback photo

The other photo was a bit different as she wore dark, bold makeup that show her eyes painted royal blue and accentuated eyelashes that reached to her hair line.

She had a chain around her mouth with bright lips as she blew a creepy kiss to the camera.

Her outfit was a load of jewels around her wrists, neck, and her chest.

Scary: The Queen of Halloween shared this spooky photo of herself on Instagram on Friday evening

Christina is currently in Las Vegas performing her Christina Aguilera - The Xperience residency.

The Grammy winner's set list appears to be a range of old and newer songs.

She is on a break right now but will pick back up again at the end of December and continue on until the end of the residency in March.
description: Christina Aguilera is having a busy evening on her Instagram. The 38-year-old powerhouse singer took to her Instagram on Friday evening to share a couple of photos.
